definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: Colombo is to western Sri Lanka as Kingston is to WHAT?
sentences.chinese: 可倫坡之於斯里蘭卡的西部，就如金斯敦之於什麼？

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Colombo on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至可倫坡機票。
